name: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
desc: Attributes that apply to a document.

items.name: static let appearance: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The appearance of the document.

items.name: static let author: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The author of the document.

items.name: static let backgroundColor: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The background color of the document.

items.name: static let bottomMargin: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The bottom margin of the document.

items.name: static let category: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The document’s category.

items.name: static let characterEncoding: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The string encoding for the document.

items.name: static let cocoaVersionDocumentAttribute: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The version of Cocoa that created the file.

items.name: static let comment: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The document comments.

items.name: static let company: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The company or organization name associated with the document.

items.name: static let converted: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: A value that indicates whether a filter service converted the file.

items.name: static let copyright: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The document’s copyright information.

items.name: static let creationTime: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The creation date of the document.

items.name: static let defaultAttributes: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The default document attributes.

items.name: static let defaultTabInterval: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The default tab stop interval for the document.

items.name: static let documentType: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The document type.

items.name: static let editor: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The name of person who last edited the document.

items.name: static let excludedElements: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The HTML elements to exclude in generated HTML.

items.name: static let fileType: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The document type for interpreting the document.

items.name: static let hyphenationFactor: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The hyphenation factor of the document.

items.name: static let keywords: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The document keywords.

items.name: static let leftMargin: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The left margin of the document.

items.name: static let manager: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The name of the author's manager.

items.name: static let modificationTime: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The modification date of the document.

items.name: static let paperMargin: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The paper margin of the document.

items.name: static let paperSize: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The paper size for the document.

items.name: static let prefixSpaces: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The number of spaces for indenting nested HTML elements.

items.name: static let readOnly: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: An indication of whether the document is read-only.

items.name: static let rightMargin: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The right margin of the document.

items.name: static let sourceTextScaling: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The source text scaling.

items.name: static let subject: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The subject of the document.

items.name: static let textEncodingName: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The name of the text encoding to use.

items.name: static let textLayoutSections: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The layout orientations for each section.

items.name: static let textScaling: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The text scaling.

items.name: static let title: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The document title.

items.name: static let topMargin: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The top margin of the document.

items.name: static let viewMode: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The view mode.

items.name: static let viewSize: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The view size.

items.name: static let viewZoom: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
items.desc: The view zoom.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a document attribute key.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a document attribute key with the specified raw value.
